main event: A witness observed a round, silver object trailing white smoke in Springfield, Missouri on June 22, 1955.
interesting points: The object was 15-20 feet in diameter and gave off a steady bright light., The sighting lasted approximately 10-15 seconds., The object was traveling from north to south before making a turn to the west., Multiple authorities concluded it could possibly be a balloon or aircraft., The observation was made from the Springfield Medical Center.
sighted object: round silver object trailing white smoke
witness description: Correctional officer who was walking outside when the sighting occurred.
